Class HibernateQueryException

                • org.springframework.dao.InvalidDataAccessResourceUsageException
                  • org.springframework.orm.hibernate5.HibernateQueryException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class HibernateQueryException
extends org.springframework.dao.InvalidDataAccessResourceUsageException
    Hibernate-specific subclass of InvalidDataAccessResourceUsageException, thrown on invalid HQL query syntax.
    Since:
    4.2
    Author:
    Juergen Hoeller
    See Also:
    SessionFactoryUtils.convertHibernateAccessException(org.hibernate.HibernateException), Serialized Form
